name: NaturalHairCareFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Natural Hair Care Facts.”
”Alexa, launch Natural Hair Care Facts.”
”Alexa, use Natural Hair Care Facts.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: natural hair care facts
des: The Natural Hair Care Facts skill gives those with natural hair helpful tips on ways to obtain and maintain healthy hair. From moisturizing to steaming, the facts give natural heads easy solutions to improve hair quality.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
